data.title: Acronis CyberApp Build
data.text:
Watch the year's most exciting launch event — Acronis CyberApp Build: Create, automate and grow!

Are you an independent software vendor (ISV), systems integrator (SI) or service provider (SP) looking to benefit from natively integrated solutions that work together? Then, you don’t want to miss this virtual event.

Acronis is proud to present our new, unique CyberApp integration technology that allows ISV’s cloud applications to be quickly integrated with the Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud platform without a single line of code.

Our integration portfolio now includes over 200 third-party products and services across various categories that work together to reduce complexity and automate the day-to-day processes of more than 20,000 Acronis partners.

Independent software vendors (ISV)

Service providers (SP)

System integrators (SI)

Integrated Solutions are more sought after then ever. While this may be true, building natively integrated solutions takes a lot of time and resources. Acronis introduces CyberApp Standard, reducing time to market with a declarative low to no code YOU SEE WHAT YOU GET UI Builder. This allows your application to natively integrate into Acronis Cyber Platform, meaning that your integration UI will appear native in the Acronis UI, ensuring that MSPs will have the best possible user experience of your integrated solution: your CyberApp.

Integrated Solutions are more sought after then ever. While this may be true, building natively integrated solutions takes a lot of time and resources. Acronis introduces CyberApps Standard, reducing time to market with a declarative low to no code YOU SEE WHAT YOU GET UI Builder. This allows your application to natively integrate into Acronis Cyber Platform, meaning that your integration UI will appear native in the Acronis UI, ensuring that MSPs will have the best possible user experience of your integrated solution: your CyberApp.

During the event, a panel of software vendors, service providers and Acronis technical experts discuss how to benefit from natively integrated solutions that work together on the Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud platform.

Intro of the Acronis CyberApp

SP Panel discussion: Using natively integrated solutions
